channel.title: How to fix morrigan javelin and add bonuses!
channel.description:
Hey guys i need help really really badly on how to add and fix bonuses in morrigans javelin, I just need the code for the bonus and for it to hit a player without doing it with special attack.
Please someone help me fix thid problem i will be very greatful and donate $5 through paypal to whoever is gonna fix my problem..!

item.title: How to fix morrigan javelin and add bonuses!
item.dc:creator: @justtesting justtesting
item.description:
@justtesting wrote:

you need the itemid for the jav then add it to the items.cfg it is is not in there. (if it has a decent store value it is there) and for the spec it could be the wrong gfx sent. or it could not have a toggle, or could just have an incorrect toggle between the spec and the original attack. i have never seen the jav spec so i dont know what either looks like personally :3

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix morrigan javelin and add bonuses!

item.title: How to fix morrigan javelin and add bonuses!
item.dc:creator: @faze1one faze1one
item.description:
@faze1one wrote:

for the hits, go to item.cfg and change the stats to your satisfaction
